'''Universal Diagnosis''' is [[Baizhu]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|3.5}}
* This skill's 2nd and 3rd attacks can hit enemies without [[Aggravation|aggravating]] them.
